item.title: Counter-Strike Skins Market Plummets $2 Billion as Valve Makes Trade-Up Change
item.content:encoded:
Counter-Strike 2 fans worldwide are ruing a recent change made by Valve that has drastically impacted the CS skins market. In an update to how players can obtain and trade Counter-Strike skins, Valve has made it so that players can offer up five Covert-quality skins for a guaranteed knife or pair of gloves. Before the update, these were some of the most valuable items on the market.

This tweak to the pre-existing trade-up system has meant that items once considered rare and expensive have crashed in value, slicing some players’ inventories a considerable amount.

Why Did Valve Destroy The Skins Market?

Valve has long had a tentative relationship with the wider skins market. The nature of the market has lent itself to some dubious practices rising in recent years, especially around the concepts of skin gambling and off-platform trading.

The most valuable Counter-Strike skins can run up price tags in the hundreds of thousands of dollars, and private collectors have parted ways with that much without thinking about it. That might be about to change, thanks to an update made by Valve that caused the skins market value to shatter, dropping by $2 billion overnight.

Valve has made these changes to shift market dynamics, rebalance the economy, make high-tier items much more attainable, and potentially even democratize rare cosmetics. Covert skins will now have their prices skyrocket as knife and glove prices, some of the highest in the game, will deflate.

Overnight, some of the most valuable knife and glove prices in Counter-Strike 2 dropped by as much as 40%. The hit caused the overall market cap for Counter-Strike skins to collapse in on itself. Before the change, the skins market was estimated to be worth as much as $5 billion.

For some, it’s a critical change that has drastic financial implications, especially for those who were HODLing their skins and weathering the market. For others, it’s a healthy correction that could make the cosmetic market in Counter-Strike 2 a little more accessible.

From a competitive perspective, this could have a knock-on impact on sponsorships, special events, and streamers opening cases and such to keep their community engaged.

Do you think this change was worth the hit, or should Valve rethink this action? Let me know on the Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news that EA DICE is testing PvE progression in Battlefield 6

item.title: Today’s Wordle #1588: Hints And Answer For October 24, 2025
item.content:encoded:
Get ready for an easier Wordle answer than the past few days. Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you’re a beginner or a daily player, today’s tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak—if you’re open to a little extra help. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Wordle, don’t worry, you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1588 for October 24, 2025.

To play today’s Wordle, head to the game’s website. If you want to go right to today’s answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here. If you’ve missed any days, check out our Wordle Answer Archive for every past answer.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s and yesterday’s editions of Wordle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a trending topic online.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, October 24, 2025

The Wordle answer for game #1588 finally brings down the challenge level. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today’s answer takes an average of 3.6 guesses out of 6 to get. That makes it almost a full guess easier than October 23’s 4.4-guess average.

General Wordle Hints For October 24

Without giving today’s Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: It shares letters with “butter,” but isn’t dairy.
  • Hint 2: Grows underground.
  • Hint 3: Often found in your pantry — or your garden.
  • Hint 4: Think potatoes.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1588 for October 24, 2025

Starter Words For October 24, 2025

If you want help getting started without having today’s Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • BUTCH
  • TRUER
  • UTTER
  • BURST

Today’s Wordle Answer For Game #1588 On October 24, 2025

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today’s Wordle below.

Answer: TUBER

If you solved today’s Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

Yesterday’s Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here’s yesterday’s Wordle answer for Game #1587 on October 23, 2025:

Answer: DRILL

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles. Reminder, you can check out every past Wordle answer in our official archive.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1588?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on October 25 will be Wordle Game #1589.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn’t fully released until 2021. The game tasks players with guessing a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

Need more help with other daily games? Let us know what games you’d like tips and clues for in the comments below, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: PlayStation 5 Overtakes PS3 in Lifetime Sales in the US
item.content:encoded:
The PlayStation 5 surpassed PlayStation 3’s lifetime sales in the US in September 2025.

The PlayStation 5 has been a smash hit for Sony, with the console still accounting for a significant share of hardware sales. This is why the developers keep working on the console and its iterations, releasing slim versions and mid-gen upgrades for the consoles. Thanks to their efforts, the console has now crossed PlayStation 3’s sales record.

The PlayStation 5 Now Sits Above PS3 and PS4 in US Sales

Spotted by Eurogamer, the new information about PlayStation 5 beating PS3 comes from a senior director at Circana, Mat Piscatella. Piscatella’s recent post on BlueSky reveals that, based on US Video Game data through September 2025, the PlayStation 5 has now surpassed the PlayStation 3 in lifetime installed base. The analyst also revealed that PS5 has been ahead of PS4 on a time-aligned basis in the US for a very long time, and as of September, it is ahead by 4.6%.

Ghost of Yotei’s Sales Performance Was “Basically Flat to that of Ghost of Tsushima”

Talking about sales, Mat Piscatella also shared some facts about Sony PlayStation’s latest game release, Ghost of Yotei. Piscatella revealed that with just one week in the market, “the US sales performance of Ghost of Yotei was basically flat to that of Ghost of Tsushima. It did great.”

The analyst added that Ghost of Tsushima launched in 2020, when the PS4’s installed base was significantly higher than the PS5’s installed base today. Additionally, there was a lot of stuff happening at the time that “significantly boosted gaming.” So, “anyone with ‘concern’ about this title should be looked at with a side eye,” concluded Piscatella.

In other news, a new Fortnite PS5 Bundle is expected to arrive by Black Friday 2025. Additionally, the PS3 received a new system software update earlier this year. What are your thoughts on the PlayStation 5 crossing PS3’s lifetime sales in the US? Let us know through the official Insider Gaming Discord.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about Steam’s new Personal Calendar feature, which helps players discover the latest and upcoming titles. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Xbox President Says Console Exclusives Are “Antiquated”
item.content:encoded:
The console wars are quickly becoming a thing of the past—if they’re not dead already. But Xbox’s President coming out and saying that Xbox exclusives, and the idea in general, are becoming antiquated, shows the direction the industry is moving towards.

Xbox’s strategies and ideologies are a shadow of what they were 20, 10, or even five years ago. Microsoft was dominating the gaming landscape in the mid-00s to late-00s, and had a myriad of exclusive franchises at its disposal: Halo, Gears of War, Forza, and others. Now, almost all of these have appeared on PlayStation at some point or another, and Sarah Bond thinks this is what people want.

“The Biggest Games In The World Are Available Everywhere”

Now, you could argue that we’ve all wanted to be able to play every game on the same console for decades, as it would save a lot of money. But business is business at the end of the day. With the gaming business, in particular, changing, Xbox President Sarah Bond’s words (via Mashable) sound as prophetic as ever:

“We’re really seeing people evolve way past that. The biggest games in the world are available everywhere. You look at Call of Duty, you look at Minecraft, you look at Fortnite, you look at Roblox. That’s actually what’s really driving community in gaming. That’s where people gather, and they have experiences. And the idea of locking it to one store or one device is antiquated for most people. You want to be able to play with your friends anywhere, regardless of what they’re on. And we’re really leaning into that with this experience.”

This is true and accurate to a certain degree. The lines between PlayStation and Xbox are as blurred as they’ve ever been. On the other hand, we can confidently predict you’ll never see Mario or Zelda anywhere near a PlayStation or Xbox console.

Still, there’s been a definite changing of the guard in recent years, and while Sony can still afford to release exclusives for PS5 users, it’s becoming more clear and obvious that Microsoft and Xbox’s goal posts are moving by the day.

Do you agree with Xbox’s President on exclusives? Is a day coming when there will be no exclusives, maybe apart from on a Nintendo device? Let us know through the Insider Gaming Discord.

If you missed it, make sure to read about Xbox’s President Confirming That Series X/S Successors Are In Development.

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.

item.title: Raise Animals Codes (October 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Redeem these Roblox Raise Animals monthly codes for October 2025 to get your hands on loads of free Coral, Gems, and Cash. Use these resources to unlock more Lasso Spins, thereby boosting your chance to acquire some Legendary or Rainbow-level animals.

Increasing your zoo’s value in Roblox Raise Animals is a true grind. Players must travel through various maps, tame different animals, and showcase them in their zoos to earn large amounts of Money. However, catching the rarest animals requires the best Lassos. Instead of spending Robux on Rubies, Money, and other resources, you can simply redeem the active Raise Animals codes to get them for free.

New players will benefit the most, as these rewards let them stock up on rare Food and Animals early on, speeding up their zoo’s growth without the hardcore grinding.

Active Raise Animals codes

  • FreeCorals – Coral and Gems (New)
    SorryForAllTheBugs –  Coral and Gems (New)
  • Ocean – Cash, Gems, and Coral 
  • Update1 –  Coral and Gems 
  • 50MVisitsTysm – Gems 

Inactive Raise Animals codes

  • SryForTheGamepassIssue
  • 10MVisitsTysm
  • 10KActiveTysm
  • Release!
  • FREE RANDOM ANIMALS
  • 5MVisitsTysm
  • 1MVisitsTysm
  • SorryForBugs
  • 3KActiveTysm
  • SorryForAllTheBugs

How To Redeem Raise Animals Codes

You must have liked Raise Animals and should be part of the game’s official Roblox group to redeem codes. Just go to the game’s homepage and scroll down to find the thumbs-up icon. Select the developer’s name to open the group interface and choose the “Join Community” button to do the same. Hence, join the group pronto and start redeeming the codes before they expire. 

Follow these steps to redeem all the active codes: 

  1. Launch the game and get into the server. 
  2. Choose the settings logo on the top right corner of the screen. 
  3. Scroll down to the last to access the code box. 
  4. Enter the code in the “Code Here…” text box. 
  5. Hit the “REDEEM” button to activate the code. 

More About Raise Animals Codes

Invest the free Money into purchasing Animals and Food. The following Animals are available in the shop: 

  • Snake – Basic
  • Buffalo – Basic
  • Fish – Basic
  • Ostrich – Basic
  • Zebra – Basic
  • Moose – Rare
  • Yak- Rare
  • Seal – Rare
  • Jellyfish – Rare
  • Toucan – Rare
  • Tiger – Epic
  • Penguin – Epic
  • Elephant – Epic
  • Crab – Epic
  • Giraffe – Epic
  • Turtle – Epic
  • Walrus – Epic
  • Gorilla – Legendary
  • Shark – Legendary
  • Whale – Legendary
  • Crocodile – Legendary
  • Polar Bear – Legendary
  • Orca – Rainbow 
  • Lion – Rainbow
  • Narvhal – Rainbow

One Lasso spin costs 50 Rubies, and ten cost 500. You can easily acquire the Legendary and Rainbow Lassos without breaking a sweat. 

Where To Find New Raise Animals Codes?

The latest codes can be found on the game’s official Discord server. To stay updated with the release of codes, you should keep track of our active codes list, as they’ll be updated whenever fresh codes drop.

Having fun using codes in Roblox games? Then check out the latest codes for 99 Nights in the Forest, Type Soul, and Azure Latch. Also, check out the Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: Effortless Tower Codes (October 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Effortless Tower monthly codes for October 2025 in Roblox to gain some much-needed Skips in the game, allowing you to ease past the levels that you get stuck at. 

Effortless Tower is one of the many obby (obstacle course) games in Roblox, where players are tasked with simply getting from one point to another without hitting any of the obstacles in the way. Although many obby games on Roblox tend to be quite challenging, Effortless Tower offers a more enjoyable difficulty, making it a better option for players looking simply for a fun experience. There are over 5000 levels in Effortless Tower, each offering a different kind of challenge. Some, however, can be too difficult to surpass for some players, and this is where the Skips that can be acquired through codes come into the picture. 

Players progress through the levels by simply moving around, jumping, and climbing, and each level is harder than the previous one. The game also offers players the option to teleport to the previous checkpoint with just a single clip, making it a very beginner-friendly gameplay experience. 

Active Effortless Tower Codes 

  • BYEMILITARY: 1 Skip (NEW)
  • SAVESKIP: 1 Skip (NEW)
  • THANKYOU: 1 Skip
  • SUMMER: 1 Skip

Expired Effortless Tower Codes

As of the writing of this article, there are no expired codes in Effortless Tower. Players are encouraged to make the most of this opportunity by redeeming the available codes quickly, as they can expire at any time. Once they do expire, they will be moved into the expired codes section. 

How To Redeem Effortless Tower Codes

Redeeming codes on Effortless Tower is a fairly straightforward process, requiring no additional steps. It’s as simple as navigating through the menus and inputting one of the active codes given above into the right text box. As simple as that sounds, newer players might find it challenging to find the codes section in the game. Here’s a step-by-step guide to make it easier for them:

  1. Launch Roblox and open up Effortless Tower.
  2. Click on the ‘Code’ button at the top of the screen.
  3. Input one of the active codes given above into the text box.
  4. Click on the confirm button to claim your rewards.

How To Get More Effortless Tower Codes

As is the case with most Roblox games, codes are often released through the game’s social media pages or its official Discord server. Tracking these on a regular basis, though, can be a hassle, and that’s where this page can be your savior. By simply bookmarking this page, you can stay up to date with the latest codes, as we update this article as soon as any new codes drop. The developers release new codes mostly during events or updates, so expect that trend to continue for Effortless Tower as well.

Enjoying our Roblox games codes coverage? Check out the codes for popular games like Steal A Brainrot, Radiant Residents, and Fix It Up on Insider Gaming!

Interested in the latest developments in the world of gaming and esports? Then join the Insider Gaming Discord server and engage with the passionate community.

item.title: Bayonetta Director Feels ‘Unique Experiences’ Matter More than Graphics
item.content:encoded:
The creator of Bayonetta, Devil May Cry, and more feels that unique gameplay mechanics are more important than graphics in action games.

During a new interview with Famitsu (via Automaton), Bayonetta creator Hideki Kamiya discussed the progress 3D action games have made lately and what he feels is most important in the genre for players and developers. Kamiya has been at the forefront of action games for a very long time and has delivered some of the biggest games in the genre.

Hideki Kamiya Wants to See Unique Experiences Which “Only That One Game Can Offer”

Kamiya first spoke about how he approaches new games, revealing that he will work on creating “a unique gameplay mechanic that can only be experienced in that game.” He elaborated with examples of systems he developed for games like Bayonetta and Okami. Bayonetta had a Witch Time system that slowed time whenever the player dodged an enemy’s attack. Okami has the Celestial Brush system, which lets players “directly affect the game world by drawing.”

The Bayonetta creator explained that as a player, he wants to “get excited by the unique experiences which only that one game can offer”, rather than improved graphics. Kamiya then praised how far 3D action games have come. He first spoke about how there weren’t many 3D action games for some years, but recently there has been a surge in “a lot of stylish, combo-based action titles.” He concluded, stating, “It’s amazing to me that someone can just start making a game and end up with something of that quality.” 

In other news, Devil May Cry 5 hit a new sales milestone thanks to the Netflix adaptation. Additionally, Hideki Kamiya wants to remake the original DMC game. What are your thoughts on Hideki Kamiya wanting unique gameplay mechanics over pretty graphics? Let us know through the official Insider Gaming Discord.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about Steam’s new Personal Calendar feature, which helps players discover the latest and upcoming titles. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
